publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7815 Richard Lochhead: The Scottish Government Code of Practice for the Welfare of Gamebirds Reared for Sporting Purposes—That the Rural Affairs and Environment Committee recommends that the Scottish Government Code of Practice for the Welfare of Gamebirds Reared for Sporting Purposes be approved. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham*

S3M-7815 Richard Lochhead: The Scottish Government Code of Practice for the Welfare of Gamebirds Reared for Sporting Purposes—That the Rural Affairs and Environment Committee recommends that the Scottish Government Code of Practice for the Welfare of Gamebirds Reared for Sporting Purposes be approved. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham
